reviewText:
Long before I became a rabid otaku, I loved this anime. I only saw the first season and part of the second before Fox heartlessly yanked it, but I'd love to get this on DVD and have the whole series.

I thought the story was awesome and had some deep themes to it, like Holly's search for her father, whom she hadn't seen since she was a small child and Tiger's search for his brother Gray Wolf.

This show is perfect for anyone who likes midgets, Velveeta cheese, and mountain goats.  Of all the shows from Japan, this one is undoubtedly the best.  The colors and animation easily beat the others, as do the stories  and the characters.  Buy this crazy video!
